summary.span: [default=false] 此参数用于构建程序集（如 DLL），这些程序集不包含普通的 App.Config 文件。

span.span: [default=false] This parameter is used for building assemblies, such as DLLs, which cannot have a normal App.Config file.

summary.span: 当为 true 时，将自动处理最后得到的依赖项关系图，如同向 AppConfigFile 参数传递了 App.Config 文件一样。

span.span: When true, the resulting dependency graph is automatically treated as if there were an App.Config file passed in to the AppConfigFile parameter.

summary.span: 此虚拟 App.Config 文件对每组冲突程序集具有 bindingRedirect 条目，以便选择最高版本的程序集。

span.span: This virtual App.Config file has a bindingRedirect entry for each conflicting set of assemblies such that the highest version assembly is chosen.

summary.span: 这样做的结果是避免有关冲突程序集的警告，因为每个冲突都将得到解决。

span.span: A consequence of this is that there will never be a warning about conflicting assemblies because every conflict will have been resolved.

summary.span: 当为 true 时，每个不同的重映射将导致高优先级注释，指示新旧版本以及该过程是自动完成的这一事实（因为 AutoUnify 为 true）。

span.span: When true, each distinct remapping will result in a high priority comment indicating the old and new versions and the fact that this was done automatically because AutoUnify was true.

summary.span: 当为 true 时，AppConfigFile 参数应为空。

span.span: When true, the AppConfigFile parameter should be empty.

summary.span: 否则会报错。

span.span: Otherwise, it's an error.

summary.span: 当为 false 时，不会自动重新映射程序集版本。

span.span: When false, no assembly version remapping will occur automatically.

summary.span: 当存在两个版本的程序集时，将发出警告。

span.span: When two versions of an assembly are present, there will be a warning.

summary.span: 当为 false 时，同一程序集不同版本间每个不同的冲突将导致高优先级注释。

span.span: When false, each distinct conflict between different versions of the same assembly will result in a high priority comment.

summary.span: 所有这些注释显示后，将显示含唯一错误代码的一条警告，其文本写有“发现不同引用版本和依赖程序集之间的冲突”。

span.span: After all of these comments are displayed, there will be a single warning with a unique error code and text that reads "Found conflicts between different versions of reference and dependent assemblies".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值是 `false`。The default value is `false`. 有关此属性的详细信息，请参阅 [ResolveAssemblyReference 任务](/visualstudio/msbuild/resolveassemblyreference-task)。For more information about this property, see [ResolveAssemblyReference Task](/visualstudio/msbuild/resolveassemblyreference-task).

summary.span: 在确定是否应在本地复制依赖项时，要进行的一项检查是查看项目文件中的父引用是否设置了 Private 元数据。

span.span: When determining if a dependency should be copied locally one of the checks done is to see if the parent reference in the project file has the Private metadata set or not.

summary.span: 如果设置了该元数据，则我们也会将其用于依赖项。

span.span: If that metadata is set then We will use that for the dependency as well.

summary.span: 但是，如果未设置该元数据，则依赖项将进行与父引用相同的检查。

span.span: However, if the metadata is not set then the dependency will go through the same checks as the parent reference.

summary.span: 其中一项检查是查看该引用是否位于 GAC 中。

span.span: One of these checks is to see if the reference is in the GAC.

summary.span: 如果某个引用位于 GAC 中，则不会对该引用进行本地复制，因为它假定该引用也位于目标计算机上的 gac 中。

span.span: If a reference is in the GAC then we will not copy it locally as it is assumed it will be in the gac on the target machine as well.

summary.span: 但是，这只适用于具体引用，而不适用于其依赖项。

span.span: However this only applies to that specific reference and not its dependencies.

summary.span: 这意味着项目文件中的某个引用可能是复制本地 false，原因是该引用位于 GAC 中，但由于依赖项不在 GAC 中，因此可能仍然会对依赖项进行本地复制。

span.span: This means a reference in the project file may be copy local false due to it being in the GAC but the dependencies may still be copied locally because they are not in the GAC.

summary.span: 这是 RAR 的默认行为，该行为会导致此属性的默认值为 true。

span.span: This is the default behavior for RAR and causes the default value for this property to be true.

summary.span: 当此属性为 false 时，我们仍将检查项目文件引用，以查看它们是否位于 GAC 中，并根据情况设置其复制本地状态。

span.span: When this property is false we will still check project file references to see if they are in the GAC and set their copy local state as appropriate.

summary.span: 但是，对于依赖项，我们不仅要检查它们是否位于 GAC 中，还要检查项目文件中的父引用是否位于 GAC 中。

span.span: However for dependencies we will not only check to see if they are in the GAC but we will also check to see if the parent reference from the project file is in the GAC.

summary.span: 如果项目文件中的父引用位于 GAC 中，则不会对依赖项进行本地复制。

span.span: If the parent reference from the project file is in the GAC then we will not copy the dependency locally.

summary.span: 注意：如果存在多个父引用并且任何一个父引用都不来自 GAC，则会将复制本地设置为 true。

span.span: NOTE: If there are multiple parent reference and ANY of them does not come from the GAC then we will set copy local to true.

value.span: 如果在确定是否应在本地复制依赖项，则其中一项检查是查看项目文件中的父引用是否设置了 Private 元数据。

span.span: if, when determining if a dependency should be copied locally, one of the checks done is to see if the parent reference in the project file has the Private metadata set.

value.span: 如果设置了此元数据，则也会将其用于依赖项。

span.span: If that metadata is set, we will use that for the dependency as well.

value.span: 如果没有设置该元数据，则依赖项将通过与父引用相同的检查。

span.span: If the metadata is not set then the dependency will go through the same checks as the parent reference.

value.span: 其中一项检查是查看该引用是否位于 GAC 中。

span.span: One of these checks is to see if the reference is in the GAC.

value.span: 如果某个引用位于 GAC 中，则不会对该引用进行本地复制，因为它假定该引用也位于目标计算机上的 gac 中。

span.span: If a reference is in the GAC then we will not copy it locally as it is assumed it will be in the gac on the target machine as well.

value.span: 但是，这只适用于具体引用，而不适用于其依赖项。

span.span: However this only applies to that specific reference and not its dependencies.

value.span: 这意味着项目文件中的某个引用可能是复制本地 false，原因是该引用位于 GAC 中，但由于依赖项不在 GAC 中，因此可能仍然会对依赖项进行本地复制。

span.span: This means a reference in the project file may be copy local false due to it being in the GAC but the dependencies may still be copied locally because they are not in the GAC.

value.span: 这是 RAR 的默认行为，该行为会导致此属性的默认值为 true。

span.span: This is the default behavior for RAR and causes the default value for this property to be true.

value.span: 如果仍要检查项目文件引用，以查看它们是否位于 GAC 中，并根据需要设置其复制本地状态，则返回。

span.span: Returns if we will still check project file references to see if they are in the GAC and set their copy local state as appropriate.

value.span: 但是，对于依赖项，我们不仅要检查它们是否位于 GAC 中，还要检查项目文件中的父引用是否位于 GAC 中。

span.span: However for dependencies we will not only check to see if they are in the GAC but we will also check to see if the parent reference from the project file is in the GAC.

value.span: 如果项目文件中的父引用位于 GAC 中，则不会对依赖项进行本地复制。

span.span: If the parent reference from the project file is in the GAC then we will not copy the dependency locally.

para.span: 如果存在多个父引用并且任何一个父引用都不来自 GAC，则会将复制本地设置为 true。

span.span: If there are multiple parent reference and ANY of them does not come from the GAC then we will set copy local to true.

summary.span: 当存在时，此列表中的程序集将成为在 XML 中列出的版本及以前所有版本中自动“统一”的内容的候选项。

span.span: When present, assemblies from this list will be candidates to automatically "unify" from prior versions up to the version listed in the XML.

summary.span: 此外，除非显示重写，否则 InGAC =“true”的程序集将视为先决条件，且 CopyLocal =“false”。

span.span: Also, assemblies with InGAC='true' will be considered prerequisites and will be CopyLocal='false' unless explicitly overridden.

summary.span: 此列表中的项可以选择指定“FrameworkDirectory”元数据，以将 InstalledAssemblyTable 与特定的框架目录关联。

summary.span: 但是，除非可再发行程序包名称以“Microsoft-Windows-CLRCoreComp”开头，否则将忽略此设置。

span.span: However, this setting will be ignored unless the Redist name begins with "Microsoft-Windows-CLRCoreComp".

summary.span: 如果只有一个 TargetFrameworkDirectories 元素，则该列表中任何缺少“FrameworkDirectory”元数据的项都将被视为已将该元数据设置为传递给 TargetFrameworkDirectories 的孤（唯一）值。

Docs.summary: 解析依赖项时要用于搜索 assemblyFiles 的位置的列表。List of locations to search for assemblyFiles when resolving dependencies. 可在此处传递以下类型的内容：(1) 普通的旧目录路径。The following types of things can be passed in here: (1) A plain old directory path. (2) {HintPathFromItem} -- 查看基本项中的 HintPath 属性。(2) {HintPathFromItem} -- Look at the HintPath attribute from the base item. 此属性必须是文件名，而不是目录名称。This attribute must be a file name *not* a directory name. (3) {CandidateAssemblyFiles} -- 查看通过 CandidateAssemblyFiles 参数传入的文件。(3) {CandidateAssemblyFiles} -- Look at the files passed in through the CandidateAssemblyFiles parameter. (4) {Registry:_AssemblyFoldersBase_,_RuntimeVersion_,_AssemblyFoldersSuffix_}，其中：(4) {Registry:_AssemblyFoldersBase_,_RuntimeVersion_,_AssemblyFoldersSuffix_} Where: _AssemblyFoldersBase_ = Software\Microsoft\[.NetFramework | .NetCompactFramework] _RuntimeVersion_ = 项目文件中的运行时版本属性 _AssemblyFoldersSuffix_ = [ PocketPC | SmartPhone | WindowsCE]\AssemblyFoldersEx_AssemblyFoldersBase_ = Software\Microsoft\[.NetFramework | .NetCompactFramework] _RuntimeVersion_ = the runtime version property from the project file _AssemblyFoldersSuffix_ = [ PocketPC | SmartPhone | WindowsCE]\AssemblyFoldersEx 然后在注册表中查找具有以下架构的项：Then look in the registry for keys with the following schema: [HKLM | HKCU]\SOFTWARE\MICROSOFT\.NetFramework[HKLM | HKCU]\SOFTWARE\MICROSOFT\.NetFramework\ v1.0.3705 AssemblyFoldersEx ControlVendor.GridControl.1.0: @Default = c:\program files\ControlVendor\grid control\1.0\bin @Description = 用于 .NET 1.0 9466 版的网格控件 @Default = c:\program files\ControlVendor\grid control\1.0sp1\bin @Description = 用于 .NET 1.0 版的网格控件 SP1v1.0.3705 AssemblyFoldersEx ControlVendor.GridControl.1.0: @Default = c:\program files\ControlVendor\grid control\1.0\bin @Description = Grid Control for .NET version 1.0 9466 @Default = c:\program files\ControlVendor\grid control\1.0sp1\bin @Description = SP1 for Grid Control for .NET version 1.0 基本注册表项包括：The based registry key is composed as: [HKLM | HKCU]\_AssemblyFoldersBase_\_RuntimeVersion_\_AssemblyFoldersSuffix_[HKLM | HKCU]\_AssemblyFoldersBase_\_RuntimeVersion_\_AssemblyFoldersSuffix_ (5) {AssemblyFolders} -- 使用 Visual Studio 2003 .NET 的 finding-assemblies-from-registry（从注册表查找程序集）架构。(5) {AssemblyFolders} -- Use the VisualStudion 2003 .NET finding-assemblies-from-registry scheme. (6) {GAC} -- 在 GAC 中查找。(6) {GAC} -- Look in the GAC. (7) {RawFileName} -- 将 Include 值视为确切的路径和文件名。(7) {RawFileName} -- Consider the Include value to be an exact path and file name.

summary.span: 无论 AutoUnify 的值如何，都将为发现的每个不同的冲突程序集标识（包括区域性和 PKT）返回一个项目，这些标识在 ApplicationConfigurationFile 中没有合适的 bindingRedirect 条目。

span.span: Each returned ITaskItem will have the following values: ItemSpec - the full fusion name of the assembly family with empty version=0.0.0.0 MaxVersion - the maximum version number.
